title: TPAF Approver Compliance Checklist
description: Standard validation schema for high-impact action approval.

items.question: Does the drafted intent strictly match the stated business purpose?
Is the data usage restricted to the absolute minimum necessary?
Is there verifiable proof of explicit consent for all PII involved?
Does this action comply with relevant regulations (PIPEDA/GDPR/EU-AI-ACT)?
Has the risk severity been rated and deemed acceptable?
Does the data retention period align with policy limits?
Is the execution path free of known security vulnerabilities?
Will this action generate a complete, immutable log entry?
